verses.verse: וַיֹּ֣סֶף <WH3254> add אִ֭יּוֹב <WH347> Moreover Job שְׂאֵ֥ת <WH5375> accept מְשָׁל֗וֹ <WH4912> his parable וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

חַי־ <WH2416> liveth אֵ֭ל <WH410> [As] God הֵסִ֣יר <WH5493> [who] hath taken away מִשְׁפָּטִ֑י <WH4941> my judgment וְ֝שַׁדַּ֗י <WH7706> and the Almighty הֵמַ֥ר <WH4843> [who] hath vexed נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> my soul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָל־ <WH3605> All
ע֣וֹד <WH5750> All the while נִשְׁמָתִ֣י <WH5397> my breath בִ֑י וְר֖וּחַ <WH7307> [is] in me and the spirit אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> of God בְּאַפִּֽי׃ <WH639> [is] in my nostrils

אִם־ <WH518> certainly תְּדַבֵּ֣רְנָה <WH1696> shall not speak שְׂפָתַ֣י <WH8193> My lips עַוְלָ֑ה <WH5766> wickedness וּ֝לְשׁוֹנִ֗י <WH3956> nor my tongue אִם־ <WH518> Nor יֶהְגֶּ֥ה <WH1897> utter רְמִיָּֽה׃ <WH7423> deceit

חָלִ֣ילָה <WH2486> God forbid לִּי֮ אִם־ <WH518> should אַצְדִּ֪יק <WH6663> that I should justify אֶ֫תְכֶ֥ם <WH853> עַד־ <WH5704> Till אֶגְוָ֑ע <WH1478> you till I die לֹא־ <WH3808> I will not אָסִ֖יר <WH5493> I will not remove תֻּמָּתִ֣י <WH8538> mine integrity מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> at

בְּצִדְקָתִ֣י <WH6666> My righteousness הֶ֭חֱזַקְתִּי <WH2388> I hold וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> and will not אַרְפֶּ֑הָ <WH7503> fast and will not let it go לֹֽא־ <WH3808> does not יֶחֱרַ֥ף <WH2778> shall not reproach לְ֝בָבִ֗י <WH3824> my heart מִיָּמָֽי׃ <WH3117> [me] so long as I live
יְהִ֣י <WH1961> become כְ֭רָשָׁע <WH7563> be as the wicked אֹ֣יְבִ֑י <WH341> Let mine enemy וּמִתְקוֹמְמִ֥י <WH6965> and he that riseth up כְעַוָּֽל׃ <WH5767> against me as the unrighteous

כִּ֤י <WH3588> when מַה־ <WH4100> what תִּקְוַ֣ת <WH8615> For what [is] the hope חָ֭נֵף <WH2611> of the hypocrite כִּ֣י <WH3588> When יִבְצָ֑ע <WH1214> though he hath gained כִּ֤י <WH3588> When יֵ֖שֶׁל <WH7953> taketh away אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> when God נַפְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH5315> any

הַֽ֭צַעֲקָתוֹ <WH6818> his cry יִשְׁמַ֥ע ׀ <WH8085> hear אֵ֑ל <WH410> Will God כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When תָב֖וֹא <WH935> cometh עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> and צָרָֽה׃ <WH6869> when trouble אִם־ <WH518> lo עַל־ <WH5921> and
שַׁדַּ֥י <WH7706> Almighty יִתְעַנָּ֑ג <WH6026> Will he delight יִקְרָ֖א <WH7121> call אֱל֣וֹהַּ <WH433> God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עֵֽת׃ <WH6256> after

אוֹרֶ֣ה <WH3384> I will teach אֶתְכֶ֣ם <WH853> בְּיַד־ <WH3027> you by the hand אֵ֑ל <WH410> of God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> What עִם־ <WH5973> is with שַׁ֝דַּ֗י <WH7706> [that] which [is] with the Almighty לֹ֣א <WH3808> I will not אֲכַחֵֽד׃ <WH3582> will I not conceal

הֵן־ <WH2005> Behold אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you כֻּלְּכֶ֣ם <WH3605> all חֲזִיתֶ֑ם <WH2372> Behold all ye yourselves have seen וְלָמָּה־ <WH4100> Why זֶּ֝֗ה <WH2088> then הֶ֣בֶל <WH1892> [it] why then are ye thus altogether תֶּהְבָּֽלוּ׃ <WH1891> vain

זֶ֤ה ׀ <WH2088> This חֵֽלֶק־ <WH2506> This [is] the portion אָדָ֖ם <WH120> man רָשָׁ֥ע ׀ <WH7563> of a wicked עִם־ <WH5973> from אֵ֑ל <WH410> with God וְֽנַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> and the heritage עָ֝רִיצִ֗ים <WH6184> of oppressors מִשַּׁדַּ֥י <WH7706> of the Almighty יִקָּֽחוּ׃ <WH3947> [which] they shall receive

אִם־ <WH518> Though יִרְבּ֣וּ <WH7235> be multiplied בָנָ֣יו <WH1121> If his children לְמוֹ־ <WH3926> [it is] for חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> the sword וְ֝צֶאֱצָאָ֗יו <WH6631> and his offspring לֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִשְׂבְּעוּ־ <WH7646> shall not be satisfied לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> with bread

[שְׂרִידֹו כ] (רִידָיו <WH8300> alive ק) בַּמָּ֣וֶת <WH4194> in death יִקָּבֵ֑רוּ <WH6912> of him shall be buried וְ֝אַלְמְנֹתָ֗יו <WH490> and his widows לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not be able תִבְכֶּֽינָה׃ <WH1058> shall not weep

אִם־ <WH518> Though יִצְבֹּ֣ר <WH6651> Though he heap up כֶּעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> as the dust כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> silver וְ֝כַחֹ֗מֶר <WH2563> as the clay יָכִ֥ין <WH3559> and prepare מַלְבּֽוּשׁ׃ <WH4403> raiment

יָ֭כִין <WH3559> He may prepare וְצַדִּ֣יק <WH6662> [it] but the just יִלְבָּ֑שׁ <WH3847> shall put [it] on וְ֝כֶ֗סֶף <WH3701> the silver נָקִ֥י <WH5355> and the innocent יַחֲלֹֽק׃ <WH2505> shall divide
בָּנָ֣ה <WH1129> He buildeth כָעָ֣שׁ <WH6211> as a moth בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> his house וּ֝כְסֻכָּ֗ה <WH5521> and as a booth עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> maketh נֹצֵֽר׃ <WH5341> [that] the keeper

עָשִׁ֣יר <WH6223> The rich יִ֭שְׁכַּב <WH7901> man shall lie down וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> never יֵאָסֵ֑ף <WH622> but he shall not be gathered עֵינָ֖יו <WH5869> his eyes פָּקַ֣ח <WH6491> he openeth וְאֵינֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH369> is no
תַּשִּׂיגֵ֣הוּ <WH5381> take hold כַ֭מַּיִם <WH4325> on him as waters בַּלָּה֑וֹת <WH1091> Terrors לַ֝֗יְלָה <WH3915> in the night גְּנָבַ֥תּוּ <WH1589> stealeth him away סוּפָֽה׃ <WH5492> a tempest
יִשָּׂאֵ֣הוּ <WH5375> wind carrieth him away קָדִ֣ים <WH6921> The east וְיֵלַ֑ךְ <WH1980> is gone וִֽ֝ישָׂעֲרֵ֗הוּ <WH8175> and as a storm hurleth מִמְּקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> him out of his place

וְיַשְׁלֵ֣ךְ <WH7993> For [God] shall cast עָ֭לָיו <WH5921> and וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> without יַחְמֹ֑ל <WH2550> upon him and not spare מִ֝יָּד֗וֹ <WH3027> out of his hand בָּר֥וֹחַ <WH1272> he would fain יִבְרָֽח׃ <WH1272> flee

יִשְׂפֹּ֣ק <WH5606> [Men] shall clap עָלֵ֣ימוֹ <WH5921> and כַפֵּ֑ימוֹ <WH3709> their hands וְיִשְׁרֹ֥ק <WH8319> at him and shall hiss עָ֝לָ֗יו <WH5921> from מִמְּקֹמֽוֹ׃ <WH4725> him out of his place
